tools.name: create_browser_session
tools.description: Create a new browser session for automation

session_id.description: Unique identifier for the browser session

tools.name: close_browser_session
tools.description: Close a browser session

tools.name: navigate_to_url
tools.description: Navigate to a specific URL

wait_for_load.description: Wait for page to fully load

tools.name: get_page_content
tools.description: Get the current page content (HTML, text, or screenshot)

tools.name: go_back
tools.description: Navigate back in browser history

tools.name: go_forward
tools.description: Navigate forward in browser history

tools.name: refresh_page
tools.description: Refresh the current page

tools.name: click_element
tools.description: Click on an element using selector

selector.description: CSS selector or XPath for the element

wait_timeout.description: Timeout in milliseconds to wait for element

tools.name: input_text
tools.description: Type text into an input field

selector.description: CSS selector for the input field

tools.name: scroll
tools.description: Scroll the page in specified direction

tools.name: send_keys
tools.description: Send keyboard keys (e.g., Tab, Enter, Escape)

selector.description: Optional selector to focus before sending keys

tools.name: extract_content
tools.description: Extract specific content from the page

selector.description: CSS selector for content to extract

tools.name: get_page_html
tools.description: Get the HTML content of the current page

selector.description: Optional selector to get HTML for specific element

outer_html.description: Get outer HTML instead of inner HTML

tools.name: create_tab
tools.description: Create a new browser tab

url.description: Optional URL to navigate to in new tab

tools.name: list_tabs
tools.description: List all open tabs in the browser session

tools.name: switch_tab
tools.description: Switch to a specific tab

tools.name: close_tab
tools.description: Close the current tab or a specific tab

tab_index.description: Optional tab index to close (0-based). If not provided, closes current tab

tools.name: upload_file
tools.description: Upload a file using a file input element

selector.description: CSS selector for the file input element

file_path.description: Path to the file to upload

tools.name: download_file
tools.description: Download a file by clicking a download link

selector.description: CSS selector for the download link/button

download_path.description: Optional path to save the downloaded file

tools.name: execute_javascript
tools.description: Execute JavaScript code on the page

return_result.description: Whether to return the result of the execution

tools.name: wait_for_element
tools.description: Wait for an element to appear on the page

selector.description: CSS selector for the element to wait for

tools.name: wait_for_load
tools.description: Wait for page to finish loading

tools.name: take_screenshot
tools.description: Take a screenshot of the page or specific element

selector.description: Optional CSS selector for element to screenshot

tools.name: get_browser_state
tools.description: Get comprehensive browser state information

tools.name: get_dom_elements
tools.description: Get clickable and interactive DOM elements

tools.name: create_agent
tools.description: Create an AI agent for browser automation

max_actions.description: Maximum number of actions the agent can take

tools.name: execute_agent_task
tools.description: Execute a task using the AI agent

task.description: Natural language description of the task

max_steps.description: Maximum number of steps to execute

tools.name: get_agent_history
tools.description: Get the action history for an agent

limit.description: Maximum number of history items to return

tools.name: list_active_sessions
tools.description: List all active browser sessions and agents

tools.name: get_session_info
tools.description: Get detailed information about a session

session_id.description: Session ID to get info for
